title: Opinion: I ask my patients what they’re grateful for. Recently, three of them cried
description: Joseph Tucker, an infectious disease doctor, asks every patient what they’re grateful for. Sometimes, their responses surprise him.
content: Joseph Tucker, an infectious disease doctor, asks every patient what they’re grateful for. Sometimes, their responses surprise him.
